mapper.select: SELECT h.id AS huntId,h.salary,j.name AS jobName,h.hunt_date AS publishDate, ft.name AS foodTypeName,ft.icon_name AS foodTypeIconName FROM hunt h INNER JOIN job j on h.job_id = j.id INNER JOIN food_type ft on ft.id = h.food_type_id INNER join resume r on r.id = h.resume_id WHERE r.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT r.id as resumeId,r.title,sui.username,sui.sex,sui.birth_date AS birthDate,su.phone FROM resume r INNER JOIN sys_user su on su.id = r.user_id INNER JOIN sys_user_info sui on sui.sys_user_id = su.id WHERE r.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT sui.head_img_name AS headImgUrl, sui.username,sui.sex, su.phone,sui.signature,sui.address, sui.birth_date AS birthDate from sys_user_info sui INNER join sys_user su on su.id = sui.sys_user_id WHERE su.id = #{userId}

select.if: SELECT c.id AS consultId, c.consult_type AS consultType it.title,it.admire_count AS admireCount, c.publish_date AS publishDate, it.image_name AS imageNames FROM consult c INNER JOIN image_text it ON c.article_id = it.id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId} AND c.consult_type = #{consultType}

SELECT c.id AS consultId, c.consult_type AS consultType v.title,v.admire_count AS admireCount, c.publish_date AS publishDate, v.video_img_name AS videoImageName, v.video_url AS videoUrl, v.play_count AS playCount FROM consult c INNER JOIN video v ON c.article_id = v.id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId} AND c.consult_type = #{consultType}

mapper.select: SELECT ura.id As recruitApplyId, ura.food_type_name AS foodTypeName, ura.publisher_name AS publisherName, ura.job_name AS jobName, ura.apply_date AS applyDate FROM user_recruit_apply ura WHERE ura.user_id = #{userId}
